FuncDef: The startup extended-system-software command sets the system extended package for the next startup. The startup extended-system-software command sets the system extended package for the next startup. By default, the system extension package for the next startup is specified for the corresponding model.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a system extension package.
The value is a string of 5 to 127 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
